name: UIDragDropSession
desc: The common interface for querying the state of both drag sessions and drop sessions.

items.name: func canLoadObjects(ofClass: NSItemProviderReading.Type) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether at least one drag item in the session can create an instance of the specified class.

items.name: func hasItemsConforming(toTypeIdentifiers: [String]) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether at least one drag item in the session conforms to at least one of the specified UTIs.

items.name: var items: [UIDragItem]
items.desc: An array of drag items in the drag session or drop session.

items.name: var allowsMoveOperation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag session permits moving drag items within the same app.

items.name: var isRestrictedToDraggingApplication: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag session is confined to the app that started the drag activity.

items.name: func location(in: UIView) -> CGPoint
items.desc: Returns the geometrical location of the userâ€™s drag activity within the specified view.
